import React from 'react'; export default function RecruitingTools() { return

Recruiting Tools

Hiring is hard, but the right tools make it easier. Our recruiting suite is built for modern teams who want to move fast and hire the best.

From applicant tracking to team collaboration and analytics, we provide everything you need to streamline your hiring process.

Key Features

  • • Applicant tracking system (ATS)
  • • Team notes and feedback
  • • Automated interview scheduling
  • • Analytics dashboard
  • • Customizable job templates
; }
